text: Sophia Schaller (born 17 September 2000) is an Austrian figure skater. She is the 2018 Sarajevo Open champion, the 2019 Santa Claus Cup bronze medalist, the 2019 Austrian national silver medalist, and the 2018 Austrian national bronze medalist. On the junior level, she is the 2016 Santa Claus Cup silver medalist and the 2017 Austrian junior national silver medalist. == Competitive highlights == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! style="background-color: #ffdead; " colspan=5 align=center | International |- !
